name: CGPDFPage
desc: A type that represents a page in a PDF document.

items.name: func getBoxRect(CGPDFBox) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the rectangle that represents a type of box for a content region or page dimensions of a PDF page.

items.name: var dictionary: CGPDFDictionaryRef?
items.desc: Returns the dictionary of a PDF page.

items.name: var document: CGPDFDocument?
items.desc: Returns the document for a page.

items.name: var pageNumber: Int
items.desc: Returns the page number of the specified PDF page.

items.name: var rotationAngle: Int32
items.desc: Returns the rotation angle of a PDF page.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the CFType ID for PDF page objects.

items.name: func getDrawingTransform(CGPDFBox, rect: CGRect, rotate: Int32, preserveAspectRatio: Bool) -> CGAffineTransform
items.desc: Returns the affine transform that maps a box to a given rectangle on a PDF page.
